name: Grow Your Vocab!
description:
Submission For Lame Jam 24:

Test your vocabulary in my riveting game, Grow Your Vocab! 

1 - Type as many words as you can think of from the English dictionary.

2 - Each word you type earns you some (in-game) money!

3 - If you save up enough, you can buy yourself some plant food to grow your beloved sunflower. Watch out - the higher he grows, the more food he'll need, and the more expensive he'll get to maintain :(

How many words can you think of?! Try it yourself!!1!
